channel.title: Need a little help
channel.description:
When I was compiling server, got these errors
[code]client.java:22844: cannot find symbol symbol : variable UseBow location : class client UseBow = true; ^ client.java:22851: cannot find symbol symbol : variable UseBow location : class client UseBow = true; ^ client.java:22857 cannot find symbol symbol : variable UseBow location : class client UseBow = true; ^ client.java:22862: cannot find symbol symbol : variable UseBow location : class client if(UseBow){ ^ client.java:22884: cannot find symbol symbol : variable UseBow location : class client } else if(!UseBow) {[/code]
I just got started coding a server so would be appreciated if I can get some help. :)

item.title: Need a little help
item.dc:creator: @IJ_A_D_I IJ A D I
item.description:
@IJ_A_D_I wrote:

Thanks for your help was infact missing a bracket.

Read full topic

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

your probably either missing a bracket or a ;
